Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The people of Australia are actively discussing and calling on their government to address the nationwide issues plaguing their country. The National Cabinet meets today to discuss the pressing need for an overhaul of the Medicare system climate resilience measures in the country's rapidly growing outer suburbs and visa rule changes that will enable more healthcare professionals such as foreign doctors to work in the Australian health system. Additionally the Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander legal sector seeks emergency funding to meet increased demand for its services.
